content: Hi all. I just discovered this chat I'm trying to setup a new zulip server, but there is some problme of authentication with google.... so my question is: Zulip absolutely need smtp.gmail.com or we can use the localhost smtp server without authentication?
@maxlinux2000 you need to use something; but it definitely doesn't have to be gmail. It's easy to get a free mailgun account, for example
The comment documentation in /etc/zulip/settings.py does describe how to make gmail work, though
